name: Mystical Purple Forest
description: A mystical purple forest with glowing mushrooms and fireflies. The trees have dark bark and luminescent purple leaves. Peaceful atmosphere with floating particles.

name: Volcanic Wasteland
description: A volcanic wasteland with rivers of lava and obsidian spires. Dark rocky terrain with ash particles in the air. Hot and dangerous environment.

name: Cherry Blossom Meadow
description: A cherry blossom meadow with pink petals floating in the air. Gentle hills covered in pink and white flowers. Peaceful and beautiful atmosphere.

name: Frozen Tundra
description: A frozen tundra with aurora borealis and ice crystals. Snow-covered landscape with frozen trees. Cold and mystical environment.

name: Tropical Paradise
description: A tropical paradise with palm trees and turquoise water. Warm sandy beaches with colorful flowers. Peaceful and vibrant atmosphere.

name: Dark Swamp
description: A dark swamp with dead trees and eerie fog. Murky green water with vines and mushrooms. Spooky and mysterious atmosphere.
